courses.title: Year 1: Conversational Arabic (Beginner)
courses.description: Build basic conversational skills for everyday situations. Learn essential vocabulary, greetings, and introductions.

instructor.name: Dr. Amina Hassan
instructor.title: Arabic Language Specialist
instructor.bio: Dr. Amina Hassan is an expert in Arabic linguistics and has taught over 1,000 students worldwide.

learningOutcomes: Build basic conversational skills for everyday situations
Learn essential vocabulary, greetings, and introductions
Gain confidence in introducing yourself, family, and asking simple questions
Begin understanding simple dialogues and responding with basic sentences

units.title: Unit 1: Arabic Alphabet & Basic Sounds
units.description: Master the Arabic alphabet, letter forms, and pronunciation

units.title: Unit 2: Basic Vocabulary & Greetings
units.description: Learn essential vocabulary for daily interactions and proper greetings

courses.title: Year 2: Fluency in Daily Life (Lower-Intermediate)
courses.description: Hold conversations in common situations and develop listening and speaking for day-to-day activities.

instructor.name: Prof. Omar Al-Rashid
instructor.title: Conversational Arabic Expert
instructor.bio: Prof. Omar Al-Rashid is a renowned Arabic linguist and has published several books on Arabic grammar and conversation.

learningOutcomes: Hold conversations in common situations (shopping, travel, family, work)
Develop listening and speaking for day-to-day activities
Learn present tense grammar, verbs, and forming sentences
Start reading short paragraphs and simple stories

units.title: Unit 4: Shopping & Daily Activities
units.description: Learn vocabulary and phrases for shopping and daily routines

units.title: Unit 5: Travel & Transportation
units.description: Master travel-related vocabulary and transportation terms

units.title: Unit 6: Present Tense Grammar
units.description: Understand and use present tense verbs in context

courses.title: Year 3: Grammar Mastery & Storytelling (Intermediate)
courses.description: Understand past and future tenses, build vocabulary, and learn to narrate personal stories.

instructor.name: Dr. Fatima Al-Zahra
instructor.title: Arabic Grammar Specialist
instructor.bio: Dr. Fatima Al-Zahra is a renowned Arabic linguist and has published several books on Arabic grammar and conversation.

learningOutcomes: Understand past and future tenses, plurals, and adjectives
Build vocabulary for daily tasks, hobbies, and interests
Learn to narrate personal stories and describe events in detail
Read and summarise short articles and stories

courses.title: Year 4: Complex Sentences & Writing Skills (Upper-Intermediate)
courses.description: Develop writing abilities and understand complex sentence structures.

instructor.name: Prof. Ahmed Khalil
instructor.title: Arabic Writing Expert
instructor.bio: Prof. Ahmed Khalil is a renowned Arabic linguist and has published several books on Arabic grammar and conversation.

learningOutcomes: Develop the ability to write short essays and letters
Understand complex sentence structures, connectors, and transitions
Explore topics like culture, religion, and society
Engage in longer conversations and group discussions

courses.title: Year 5: Advanced Reading, Debating & Critical Thinking (Advanced)
courses.description: Read and analyse texts, participate in debates, and develop critical thinking skills.

instructor.name: Dr. Layla Mansour
instructor.title: Advanced Arabic Studies
instructor.bio: Dr. Layla Mansour is a renowned Arabic linguist and has published several books on Arabic grammar and conversation.

learningOutcomes: Read and analyse intermediate-level texts, articles, and news
Participate in debates, discussions, and formal conversations
Learn argumentation, persuasion, and expressing opinions in Arabic
Gain confidence in formal and informal speech

courses.title: Year 6: Mastery & Specialisation (Proficient)
courses.description: Achieve full fluency and specialise in areas of interest.

instructor.name: Sheikh Abdullah Rahman
instructor.title: Arabic Mastery Specialist
instructor.bio: Sheikh Abdullah Rahman is a renowned Arabic linguist and has published several books on Arabic grammar and conversation.

learningOutcomes: Achieve full fluency in understanding, speaking, reading, and writing
Specialise in areas of interest: Islamic studies, business Arabic, travel, etc.
Engage with native content: lectures, videos, and advanced texts
Prepare for accredited certification by Fajr as a fluent Arabic speaker
